quests.dispatcherQuestion: Emergency services, what is the location?
quests.sampleAnswer: The fire is at 123 Maple Street.

quests.dispatcherQuestion: What is the nature of the emergency?
quests.sampleAnswer: There has been a car accident with two vehicles involved.

quests.dispatcherQuestion: Is anyone injured?
quests.sampleAnswer: Yes, one person appears to have a broken arm.

quests.dispatcherQuestion: Can you stay on the line?
quests.sampleAnswer: Yes, I will stay on the line until help arrives.

quests.dispatcherQuestion: Are you in a safe location?
quests.sampleAnswer: Yes, I am across the street from the incident.
